name: [Shared] Modify Payload for Iteration
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
source_code:
# Interfaces 1
targets = ['Loopback101', 'Loopback15'] if device.name == "Washington" else ['Loopback9', 'Loopback1000']
set_var('Interfaces 1', targets, device=device.name)

# Derived Devices
set_var("Derived Devices", ["Dummy1", "Austin"] if device.name == "Austin" else ["Washington" ], device=device.name)

# Interfaces 2
set_var('Interfaces 2', ['Loopback333', 'Loopback334'])
save_result(True, {})

name: [Link Neighbors Mechanism (device.get_neighbors function)] Test get_neighbors function
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
source_code:
def names(instances):
  return {instance.name for instance in instances}

result = {}
# neighbors in both direction
results["result"] = {
  "direction=both, device": names(device.get_neighbors("device")),
	"direction=both, link": names(device.get_neighbors("link")),
	"direction=source, device": names(device.get_neighbors("device", direction="source")),
	"direction=source, link": names(device.get_neighbors("link", direction="source")),
	"direction=destination, device": names(device.get_neighbors("device", direction="destination")),
  "direction=destination, link" : names(device.get_neighbors("link", direction="destination")),
	"direction=both, device, 10G": names(device.get_neighbors("device", model="10G")),
  "direction=both, link, 400G": names(device.get_neighbors("link", model="400G")),
  "direction=source, device, 40G": names(device.get_neighbors("device", direction="source", model="40G")),
  "direction=destination, link, 10G": names(device.get_neighbors("link", direction="destination", model="10G")),
}
results["expected_result"] = {
  "direction=both, device": {"Austin", "Atlanta", "Houston", "LosAngeles"},
	"direction=both, link": {"link13", "link25", "link0", "link24", "link25-3", "link25-2"},
	"direction=source, device": {"Atlanta", "LosAngeles"},
	"direction=source, link": {"link25", "link24", "link25-3", "link25-2"},
	"direction=destination, device": {"Austin", "Houston"},
  "direction=destination, link": {"link13", "link0"},
	"direction=both, device, 10G": {"Houston"},
  "direction=both, link, 400G": {"link25", "link24", "link25-3", "link25-2"},
  "direction=source, device, 40G": set(),
  "direction=destination, link, 10G": {"link0"},
}

results["success"] = True
for test, result in results["result"].items():
    if result != results["expected_result"][test]:
        results["success"] = False

parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
source_code:
# Click on "i" to right of "Source Code" for examples.
results["color"] = "#03fcf0" if device.name == "Washington" else "#fc03db"
result = {}
results["success"] = True
results["result"] = result

name: [Functions: filtering] Get Cisco Devices
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
source_code:
result = filtering("device", constraints={"model": "Cisco"})
results["success"] = len(result) == 21
results["result"] = result

name: [Functions: filtering] Regex-based filtering on names
creator: admin
parameterized_form:
name = StringField('Name', [InputRequired()])
initial_payload = DictField()
target_devices = MultipleInstanceField('Devices', model='device')
target_pools = MultipleInstanceField('Pools', model='pool')
device_query = StringField('Device Query', python=True, widget=TextArea(), render_kw={'rows': 2})
device_query_property = SelectField('Query Property Type', choices=(('name', 'Name'), ('ip_address', 'IP address')))
multiprocessing = BooleanField('Multiprocessing', default=False)
max_processes = IntegerField('Maximum number of processes', default=15)
source_code:
result = filtering("device", constraints={"name": "A.*n", "name_filter": "regex"})
results["success"] = len(result) == 6
results["result"] = result
